pdb18.gui.spatial

Interface MapObject

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Enclosure, Lake, Park, Path, Tree

    public interface MapObject
    The interface represents all map objects which the map can display.
    Author:
    David Bednařík (xbedna62@stud.fit.vutbr.cz)
